name: Raglan sleeve tea
description: A dress that smiles. That’s HARIIET, a bright, tie waist tea dress that will make you stand out like the star you are. Pair this lustrous piece with strappy sandals and get ready to make an impression. Smiles all round.

name: Leather clutch bag
description: Get party ready with the ABYOO clutch bag. With its gathered leather detailing and chain strap, this will elevate your going-out outfit to an instant classic in no time.

name: Printed long sleeved
description: Stand out from the herd in SANDIIA, our zebra dress. Go wild for its fluid, flowing lines, blouson sleeves, split hem, and adjustable belt to make the waist as fitted or relaxed as you like (handy during those indulgent summer picnics). Team with strappy flat sandals for daytime brunch sophistication, or with heels and statement earrings for dinner-date glamour.

name: Knotted leather sandal
description: Keep it comfy in Pilford, our knotted flat leather sandal. It’s open-toed design is perfect as the summer temperatures rise, and its long graceful ties can be looped into girly bows or gladiator-style knots depending on your mood. By purchasing this product, you are supporting responsible leather manufacturing through the Leather Working Group

name: Ring cross bag
description: Get party ready with the ABYOO clutch bag. With its gathered leather detailing and chain strap, this will elevate your going-out outfit to an instant classic in no time.

name: Sweat Shoulder Detail
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Puff skater
description: Knock their spots off in STEVIEE, our spot-print skater dress. Swoon over sweet details like puffed sleeves, a faux-wrap over front, and matching tie belt. Team with hi-top trainers for a daytime look perfect for picnics and pub gardens – just add sunshine.

name: Slouchy bucket bag
description: Slouchy but still stylish – that’s the MYLOO bucket bag. Its top grain leather material and gold-toned metal touches ensures it’s smart enough to mean business.

name: Drench High
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Halterneck occasion
description: A sense of occasion. LELLY is far from an everyday dress. Boasting an elegant halter neck, cinched waist, keyhole back detail and side slit, it is a dress that will surely make an impression. Pair with strappy sandals and you’re sure to turn heads.

name: Embellished crystal
description: Who wouldn’t love an extra touch of glamour for their shoe rotation? When it comes to your date night go-to, the elegant GLEAMY Embellished Crystal 80mm Sandal is a match made in Ted heaven. Delightful detailing with a statement heel to match, pair yours with romantic moments with that special someone.

name: Ruched bodycon mini
description: Short on length, big on style. WYATTE is the minidress here to save your summer. Its bodycon fit and flattering ruching ensure you’ll turn heads whether you’re at brunch or on the dancefloor, whilst the statement balloon sleeves and ruffle hem keep things on trend.

name: Printed cami
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Soft Flat Sandal
description: Lazy, hazy summer days call for easy, effortless footwear. Step forward PEBBA, our new flat sandal. Crafted from buttery soft leather, its understated knotted design is equally elegant with a summer dress for a saunter in the park as it is with jeans for a relaxed Sunday pub look. Just add sunshine.

name: Leopard Print Blouse
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Quilted Jogger
description: The quilted trend isn’t quitting any time soon. LIZZBEL is a cosy jogger with a fresh feel thanks to its quilted, padded texture. Team with co-ord statement sleeve top IZADORI for a comfy, casual look that is anything but basic.

name: Quilted Jersey Top
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Nylon belt bag
description: Belt bags are a trend that’s here to stay, so tap into it with CARNIE. This stylish bag has plenty of pockets to keep your essentials organised, and the adjustable strap ensures a perfect fit every time, no matter how you choose to wear it. This piece is made of certified recycled polyester. Using recycled polyester helps divert plastic from ending in landfills.

name: Flower sweater
description: Are florals ever out of fashion? The SHIYLO sweatshirt takes a classic flower motif and gives it a fresh update. Its relaxed, slightly oversized fit and dropped shoulders means that it looks great with your favourite jeans or thrown over a pretty summer dress for a casual look on a breezy evening out.

name: Pouch Crossbody
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Acid wash
description: Throw it back with POASTA, the acid wash t-shirt. In an oversized fit, this 100% cotton t-shirt will be your go-to this summer. Comfortable, on-trend and pairs with practically everything. What more could you ask for?

name: Colour Block Sweatshirt
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Puffer nylon tote
description: Keep everything covered with QUINSIN, the puffer nylon tote. This quilted bag is made from 100% recycled polyester, meaning it will look after your precious cargo as well as looking after the environment too. With a zip-up compartment, you’ll know your items are stored safely, not to mention in style.

name: Barrel leg denim jean
description: Refresh your denim collection with ELLRA. These jeans have an on-trend barrel leg cut – with its high-rise waist, loose legs, and length cropped nonchalantly above the ankle, it’s as flattering as it is comfy (and they are very comfy indeed). They look great with pretty much anything, but we like ours best with a slouchy sweatshirt or slogan t-shirt for casual weekend strolls.

description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Mint green jean
description: When it comes to jeans, make sure you're getting the best of the best. So, meet ZAHHRA, the 100% cotton jeans, with a frayed hem, contrast stitching and exposed button fastening. Oh, and did we mention they come in cool mint green? That's everything you need when it comes to impressing and more.

description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Straight Wide Corduroy
description: Need some extra flare? Try the BENITOT wide leg trousers. Made from a soft corduroy fabric with a leg-lengthening high-waist cut, it adds a touch of retro cool to every day looks. Team yours with a graphic tee tucked in and a cropped jacket for easy weekend brunch style.

name: Straight Corduroy Trouser
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Knitted Co-ord
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Ribbed lounge hoodie
description: Stay cosy with the SHANEY lounge hoodie. This ribbed knit top has a slouchy, relaxed fit and half-zip fastening for maximum comfort. Team with your favourite joggers for a stylish take on lazy weekend dressing.

name: Printed structured
description: Need more structure in your life? CACTI is the bold silhouette printed t-shirt you’ve been looking for. Tapping into this season’s statement sleeve trend, its layered shoulders will cause a stir whatever the situation. Finished off with a subtle metal Ted Baker tag, team with your favourite jeans for a fresh take on weekend style, or a leather mini for extra impact.

name: Puff sleeve square
description: Take to the sun, with PARASOL. The 100% silk puff sleeve top will be your go-to when those summer plans come calling. Pair with white jeans or wide-leg trousers for a sophisticated look that will impress. With its floral print and frill details, this sweet addition to your wardrobe will come to your rescue for a long time to come.

name: Long sleeve t-shirt
description: Long sleeves don’t need to be basic; take CANADA, for example. The 100% organic cotton long sleeve t-shirt, coming with our signature magnolia print embroidered appliqué patch at the chest, meaning it's comfortable yet classic with a twist. Simple yet elevated.

name: Textile runner
description: Put your best foot forward in NEANTH, the textile trainers. These comfortable trainers will give you everything when it comes to casual dressing. Whether they're dressing down a smart ensemble or keeping it casual all-round, the choice is yours.

name: Paper touch backpack
description: Longing for a new backpack? Give into CRAYVE. Crafted from paper-touch fabric, it features roomy zip pockets and an internal divider to keep all your essentials in check. Throw in a seriously sleek design and versatile colour palette, and you have a modern classic. No wonder we CRAYVE it.

name: Casual chino trouser
description: You don’t mess with the classics. GENBEE are timeless chino trousers with an emphasis on comfort, featuring a slim cut, zip fly, belt loops. Looking equally good with your favourite t-shirt as it does with a crisp shirt, it’ll be a wardrobe mainstay for years to come.

name: Quilted tote bag
description: The classic tote given a 90s edge, our PERCENT puffa tote is your new favourite bag. Perfect for those days when have a few extra things to carry, this quilted wonder’s inner pockets, broad shoulder strap and zip fastening has your back. You can’t argue with the maths. This piece is made of certified recycled polyester. Using recycled polyester helps divert plastic from ending in landfills.

name: Jersey Jogger
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Polo overarm
description: New-age polo at the ready. VIRTUAL has all you need to upgrade your polo game, just in time for summer. Coming in a minimal stripe print and with contrast cuffs, shoulder detailing and polo collar, this update will have you feeling put together, and all you need to do is pull it on. Simple, effective, necessary.

name: Cotton chino shorts
description: Ensure you stay dapper as the temperature heats up in the BUENOSE chino shorts from Ted. Made in soft cotton, this crisp pairing can be worn with casual T-shirts for warm weather barbecues, or with a smart shirt for a more refined look.

name: Leather Sneaker
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Slub polo
description: Casual polo? Yes, please. DISTANC is here to provide all you need in high-class polo dressing. With a polo collar and made from linen, this classic polo style shirt will be a final layer made for summer and beyond.

name: Cotton chino pant
description: Loosen up. PEIK does both; stay in or go out in this denim wonder. Crafted from 100% organic cotton it is as good for the environment as it is for your outfit. Pair with a textured jumper for the colder months, or a Havana print t-shirt for a warmer occasion. Either way, you’re guilt free.

name: Leather trainers
description: Take more stylish steps in our WYLEE trainers. Made in leather, they toe the line between smart and casual with ease, and are completed with a classic lace up fastening for a final flourish. By purchasing this product, you are supporting responsible leather manufacturing through the Leather Working Group

name: Hooded sweatshirt
description: Level up your loungewear with the HENDON long sleeved sweatshirt made from 100% organic cotton. Its classic cut boasts a cosy hood and roomy front pockets, as well as a loose cut relaxed enough to accommodate that extra-large portion of chips. It’s finished off with our signature magnolia applique and tag to give it that little extra something. Your wardrobe basics, but better.

name: Quilted messenger
description: Some events require more than what your pocket can hold. Step forward CHUPP, our quilted messenger bag. The perfect just-roomy-enough size, with adjustable shoulder strap and a chunky zip fastening, this 90s-inspired piece is perfect for sunny afternoons in the park or pub garden. Shell made from recycled polyester. This piece is made of certified recycled polyester. Using recycled polyester helps divert plastic from ending in landfills.

name: Striped rugby top
description: No matter well your rugby team do, the OTLYRUN rugby shirt has your back. With its relaxed fit, classic spread polo collar, and panelled stripe print, has everything you need to casual weekend dressing. Team with your favourite jeans for a look perfect for lazy pub garden afternoons with mates.

name: Leather hiker boot
description: Some hiking boots are too stylish to keep for mountain climbing. LIYKERR is crafted from high-quality leather, with a classic high-top shape and contrasting colour soles. Stylish and sturdy, they’ll be a favourite for seasons to come, whether you’re in the wilds, or just having some wild nights out.

name: Mid wash jean
description: Do your jean collection a favour and add SIMAY into the mix. This straight leg jean has a narrow fit but with its nod jeans of years past, in its contrast turn-up style, you’ll have that vintage style yet new jean feeling. This piece is made of organic cotton. Organic cotton has a proven lower environmental impact than conventional cotton, as it reduces water usage, greenhouse gas emissions, and eliminates the use of harmful chemicals in the farming process

name: Striped sweat
description: If you’re in the market for a soft touch, long sleeve sweat that lies on the laid-back side of cool, look no further than KONCALL. The lightweight sweat that comes in a striped pattern is perfect for summer days and wintery mornings. The possibilities are truly endless.

name: Retro sole sneaker
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Patchwork Jacket
description: If you’re in the market for a soft touch, long sleeve sweat that lies on the laid-back side of cool, look no further than KONCALL. The lightweight sweat that comes in a striped pattern is perfect for summer days and wintery mornings. The possibilities are truly endless.

name: Patchwork short
description: Do your jean collection a favour and add SIMAY into the mix. This straight leg jean has a narrow fit but with its nod jeans of years past, in its contrast turn-up style, you’ll have that vintage style yet new jean feeling. This piece is made of organic cotton. Organic cotton has a proven lower environmental impact than conventional cotton, as it reduces water usage, greenhouse gas emissions, and eliminates the use of harmful chemicals in the farming process

name: Space dyed polo
description: Anyone for polo? DALMOR is a timeless polo shirt with a fresh twist, thanks to its space-dyed fabric, contrasting-coloured collar, and our signature stitched magnolia flower logo. Perfect with jeans or chinos for sunny pub garden afternoons or weekend park strolls, it’s the perfect blend of classic and contemporary.

name: Nylon bucket hat
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Floral printed shirt
description: Picture the scene… you're on holiday, getting ready to head out to sample the local cuisine, your skin's sun-kissed, you're getting prepared for a night in the evening heat. KNITTIN is your answer when it comes to what to wear. A floral button-up shirt, coming in an oversized fit, perfect for those warm summer evenings. Keeping it tropical, yet always on point. This cotton blend is a holiday essential. Is your bag packet yet?

name: Floral printed short
description: Take to the water in DUNPHY, the floral printed swim shorts. Pairs perfectly with sun-kissed skin, this pair will be there for you, from dips in the pool to adventures at sea. With side pockets and a zip-up back pocket, these will keep your all-important cargo safe, no matter what.

name: Strike printed
description: Stay on top of your on-duty but low-key look with the KRANE polo shirt. This jacquard textured polo shirt will be the final touch to any hard-working ensemble, from office desk to bar in no-time. Sorry, drinks not included.

name: Recycled PU Bumbag
description: Get ready to strike in our COBBRA bumbag. A ‘90s classic bought sharply up to date, it features adjustable straps, the Ted Baker logo embossed on the front pocket, inner and outer pockets, and plenty of room for all your essentials. All in sleek black recycled PU finished off with electric blue trim and polished metal buckles. This piece is partly made from pre and post consumer recycled materials.

name: Signature crew
description: Sun’s out, specs on. When the sunny days roll around look to TAAMRA to accessorise your cotton dresses, short shorts and swimwear. In a fashion forward oversized, butterfly frames, this is a pair you can keep from year to year. Now, what time is the sun arriving?

name: Scale printed polo
description: Polo? Yes, please. Here's MICSUP, the geo print polo shirt which will give your wardrobe that fresh feeling. Coming in an abstract geo print, this one is made from 100% organic cotton so that you can feel comfortable with your conscience too.

name: Slip on trainer
description: Take great strides with BITULA, our slip on elastic trainer. Its sleek, minimalist style is understated to with any outfit you throw at it, treading the line between smart and casual with ease. Sometimes the simplest things make the biggest impact. By purchasing this product, you are supporting responsible leather manufacturing through the Leather Working Group.

name: Zip up jacket
description: Casual wardrobe in need a refresh? Reach for the REBOOT collared zip-up jacket. Crafted from a soft organic cotton, it’s the perfect layering piece – great over a summer t-shirt when the pub garden gets chilly, or over a sweater for an outdoorsy stroll in the colder months. Throw in a zip chest pocket and front hand-warmer pockets, and you have practical top you’ll reach for again and again.

name: Pilot sunglasses
description: A shape that will never go out of style, Ted’s MIRA sunglasses come artfully updated with a sleek stainless steel frame trimmed with subtle bows. Cool coloured lenses complete the look on this polished and pretty pair.

name: Pilot sunglasses
description: Radiate California-cool with the SUTTEN glasses. The gradient-tint lenses contrast perfectly against the silver frames, while the aviator shape makes them a classic staple that never goes out of style.
